NLP Pipeline

  • View page source

Data Module (src/data)

Handles preprocessing of raw datasets and audio files into model-ready formats for training and inference.

Data Preprocessing CLI

Translate Polish sentences to English using a pretrained translation model.

src.data.CLI_data_preprocessing.translate_texts(texts: list, model_name='Helsinki-NLP/opus-mt-pl-en') → list[source]

Translate Polish sentences into English using a pretrained translation model.

Parameters:

  • texts (list of str) – List of sentences in Polish to translate.

  • model_name (str, optional) – Name of the HuggingFace translation model. Defaults to “Helsinki-NLP/opus-mt-pl-en”.

Returns:

Translated sentences in English.

Return type:

list of str

CLI utility for preprocessing .csv, .mp3, or .txt input into labeled output for training or prediction.

Example:

python src/data/CLI_data_preprocessing.py \
    --input data/rest/test.txt \
    --output data/processed/output.csv

Data Ingestion

Translate Polish sentences to English using a pretrained translation model.

src.data.data_ingestion.upload_file(filepath: str) → str[source]

Upload an audio file to the AssemblyAI transcription API.

Parameters:

filepath (str) – Full path to the local audio file (e.g. .mp3 or .wav).

Returns:

Publicly accessible upload URL returned by the API.

Return type:

str

Raises:

Exception – If the upload fails due to a bad response or other issue.

Ingest and validate raw data from multiple modalities (text/audio) into structured CSVs.

File Layout

src/
└── data/
    ├── CLI_data_preprocessing.py
    ├── data_ingestion.py
    ├── mp3/
    ├── processed/
    ├── train/
    ├── rest/
    └── __init__.py
